dataJson.description: Our bachelor project for VIA University College
dataJson.name: Cloud CMS
dataJson.story: Our bachelor project. A Cloud CMS solution that emphasizes production ready speed and ease of usage by providing out of the box Templates for the most used website types and the possibility to attach an external database. Cloud CMS supports automatic deployment on Heroku with the click of a button, offers and admin panel and exposes an API that facilitates CRUD interaction with the content.
